availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John E. Cooper (Rowan County, Kentucky, lawyer)

body.p: Rowan County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Married to Margarett S. Turner in Morgan County, Kentucky, on January 16, 1859. Father of Henry L. Cooper. Lawyer in Rowan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rowan County, p. 643.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, West Liberty, p. 319A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 179.
Find A Grave, "Judge John E. Cooper (1838-1907)," Memorial #84918084, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84918084 (accessed April 30, 2020).
